metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24975 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: The --mirror documentation for Git through 2.35.1 does not mention theavailability of deleted content, aka the "GitBleed" issue. This couldpresent a security risk if information-disclosure auditing processes relyon a clone operation without the --mirror option.

criterions.comment: git: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
